history.narrative: Law 6-108 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-256, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 28, 1986, and February 11, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 24, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-138 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
